remarks: Functionality of the disjointified hom-set function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
homarcl.h $e |- H = ( HomA ` C ) $.
homafval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
homafval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
homaf $p |- ( ph -> H : ( B X. B ) --> ~P ( ( B X. B ) X. _V ) ) $.
